name: The chicken challenge
description:
An advanced thinking strategy and memory game.

At each stage you will have to remember more and more. Which dishes to serve to which guest.

Hungry chickens arrive at your restaurant, give each one the dish she ordered otherwise you will be disqualified and have to start from the beginning! Because as we say - today's guest is tomorrow's dish.

Will you be able to feed enough chickens to not starve yourself?

Try to challenge friends too.
